body: Just wondering why both Nebula & Walls are Down? Until then there's just Nexus, Avicade, CTH, & Elimination. :(

title: Why is Nebula & Walls Down?

replies.body: Nobody plays any of the above, so now the world is going to explode.

Ill tell you why its down. It is to encourage playing of other games.
The games shut down were the top 2 games. Is this a coincidence? I think not. The Illumanati forsaw this as I am part of the Illumanati. Muahahaha

replies.body: I have the reason: In a galaxy far far away a little human floating around in space was like "I wonder the Avicus is like after 3 months in space." So he used his mind to penetrate obama and we all know obama plays Avicus 24/7 like what else is he doing? Certainly not running a country but anyway the human got on obamas computer and got on Avicus and then realized Obama is Notch. So he shut down Nebula. #ThanksObama
